title: Research data quality: Truncated-result, assistant-explanation, assistant-code
description: Analyze samples of Truncated-result, assistant-explanation, assistant-code. For each type: extract samples, score relevance, recommend handling strategy.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Paper 1 (Truncated-result): Extract 5+ samples of 'Truncated-result' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 1 (Truncated-result): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
Paper 2 (assistant-explanation): Extract 5+ samples of 'assistant-explanation' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 2 (assistant-explanation): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
Paper 3 (assistant-code): Extract 5+ samples of 'assistant-code' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 3 (assistant-code): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
